name: Pacbase: Avoid PMS using Perform statement with function <F90
description: Pacbase: Perform should execute only functions defined >= F90
rationale: Macros are designed to be used largely by programs. Macros should contain PERFORM statement only on function >=F90 in order to respect Best Practices.

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Modularity and OO Encapsulation Conformity
